survey_brief: This survey aims to gather user feedback on the security features of online banking platforms to enhance security measures and user trust.

questions.question_text: How often do you use online banking services?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice scale to ensure clarity and ease of response.

script.question_text: How often do you use online banking services?

questions.question_text: Which of the following security features are you aware of in your online banking platform? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-choice format to allow multiple selections.

script.question_text: Which of the following security features are you aware of in your online banking platform? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the security features of your online banking platform?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the security features of your online banking platform?

questions.question_text: Have you ever experienced a security breach or unauthorized access to your online banking account?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice format for clarity.

script.question_text: Have you ever experienced a security breach or unauthorized access to your online banking account?

questions.question_text: If you answered 'Yes' to the previous question, please describe the incident briefly.
questions.client_notes: Use an open-text field to gather detailed feedback.

script.question_text: If you answered 'Yes' to the previous question, please describe the incident briefly.

questions.question_text: Which additional security features would you like to see implemented in your online banking platform?
questions.client_notes: Use an open-text field to gather suggestions.

script.question_text: Which additional security features would you like to see implemented in your online banking platform?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your online banking platform to others based on its security features?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice scale to measure likelihood.

script.question_text: How likely are you to recommend your online banking platform to others based on its security features?

questions.question_text: Do you feel adequately informed about the security measures in place for your online banking platform?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice format for clarity.

script.question_text: Do you feel adequately informed about the security measures in place for your online banking platform?

questions.question_text: What is your primary concern regarding the security of your online banking platform?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice format with an optional 'Other' field.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button with an open-text option for 'Other'

script.question_text: What is your primary concern regarding the security of your online banking platform?

questions.question_text: If you selected 'Other' in the previous question, please specify your concern.
questions.client_notes: Use an open-text field to gather specific concerns.

script.question_text: If you selected 'Other' in the previous question, please specify your concern.
